intro: the coffe making companion for all, the best place to learn about coffee
desc: the project was built by a group of people including myself, i was in charge of the front-end side to match the design given by the designers of the project. furthermore, it has to be interactive with the event of the user. Using the main language of web development (HTML, CSS, ReactJS), I was able to create the desired design in a month

intro: Your personalized habit tracker to build a better routine effortlessly
desc: HabbitForge is a web-based application designed to help users develop and maintain habits through daily tracking and motivational insights. I was responsible for building the front-end interface, focusing on simplicity and usability. Using ReactJS and Tailwind CSS, I created dynamic dashboards and implemented interactive features such as progress charts and habit streak notifications. The project was completed within two months and was praised for its clean design and seamless functionality.
